Doctor's Note For more on vitamin B12, check videos: [Vitamin B12 [New Vitamin B12 out my blog post, [Vegan B12 Deficiency: Putting It into Perspective](https://nutritionfacts.org/?p=3833), for more context on this terrible tragedy. My video, [American Vegans Placing Babies At Risk](https://nutritionfacts.org/video/american-vegans-placing-babies-at-risk/), addresses how commonly vegans in the United States place their infants at risk by failing to supplement their diet with vitamin B12, based on studies published recently in the [Journal of Pediatrics](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20400092) and the [Journal of the AMA.](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21427371) If you haven't yet, you can subscribe to my videos for free by [clicking here](https://nutritionfacts.org/subscribe).
